# seaPiper

Workflow output explorer for the sea-snap pipeline

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->


## Installation

You can install seaPiper from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("bihealth/seaPiper")
```
